title: An Elderly Army Vet Thwarted The Attack Of A Knife Wielding Lunatic, Saving 16 Kids’ Lives In The Process
text:
An Elderly Army Vet Thwarted The Attack Of A Knife Wielding Lunatic, Saving 16 Kids’ Lives In The Process 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
Earlier in the week, a 75-year-old Army veteran by the name of James Vernon saved a bunch of kids’ lives from a knife wielding lunatic. On...
